body: An evolution of the punching dagger, the pata is a short sword that ends in a full, fingerless gauntlet hilt. You punch rather than stab with the weapon, allowing you to put more force behind each strike. While wearing a pata, you cannot use that hand for anything else. A pata provides a +10 bonus to your CMD against being disarmed.
name: Pata
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Mastering Combat/Gladiator Weapons/Gladiator Weapon Descriptions/Pata
